name: Trick or Treat (XDA ShinigamiX)
description:
WASD - To move around

Left shift - To run

Space - To start gathering candy

Gathering - Spell out the word before the timer runs out

Note - This game is still buggy i didn't have enough time to debug those pesky bugs so expect some AI's to get stuck and probably a crash or two. Sorry

Hey thanks for playing my game! This is my entry for the Darktober Halloween game jam. This has been a fun month for me and i feel like I've learned a lot from this project from different functions and somewhat (but not really) improving my pixel art but all in all it was fun. Again thanks for playing and Happy Halloween!
